processing.transformation: counter: count(timestamp) ; sensor_id ; sensor_type ; rpm_min: id(rotation_speed) ; rpm_max: id(rotation_speed) ; rpm_sum: id(rotation_speed) ; speed_lt: lt(rotation_speed, reference_rpm_low(sensor_type)) ; speed_gt: gt(rotation_speed, reference_rpm_hi(sensor_type))

aggregations.rule: key = (sensor_id, sensor_type) ; dMax(rpm_max) ; dMin(rpm_min) ; dSum(rpm_sum) ; lSum(speed_lt) ; lSum(speed_gt) ; lSum(counter)
